name: Green Bean and Tomato Salad

ingredients.name: small onion
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut in half, then thinly sliced

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix or Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix

preparation: Place chilled green beans, onion, tomato and Feta cheese in serving bowl.
Whisk together remaining ingredients. Pour over salad and mix gently. Serve at room temperature.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, itâ€™s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.
